subject: Loan request approved
body:
Your credit history doesn't matter to us!
If you OWN property and want IMMEDIATE pin money to spend ANY way you like, or simply wish to LOWER your entire payment by a third or more, here is our deal we can offer you TODAY (hurry, this offer will expire THIS EVENING):
$365,000+ loan
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest monthly payments!
Hurry, when the deal is gone, it is gone. Simply fill this elementary form... 
Do not worry about approval, your credit will not disqualify you!!
http://inteyster.com/
